about_the_game:
AI Sparks Studio is a user-friendly interface designed to empower game developers to efficiently utilize their own API access to state‑of‑the‑art AI models. Engage in insightful consultations with AI models like OpenAI’s GPT-4, unlocking expert guidance on game design, story creation, character development, game balancing, and more. Leverage the robust speech-to-text capabilities of the Whisper model and transform dialogues into lifelike speech audio with the ElevenLabs service for immersive game experiences.

With AI Sparks Studio, take full control of your AI interactions. Manage the model’s context memory limitation and gain transparent insights into its usage, limit, and the estimated cost of generation. Choose the LLM for text generation and control every parameter the API provides.

Experiment with different AI models or settings by branching out a discussion from any point. Keep track of your ElevenLabs service usage and manage your monthly quota with ease.

All discussions are stored locally, ensuring data security and easy integration into your game development projects.

AI Sparks Studio is an independently developed tool designed to enhance your experience with cutting-edge AI technologies by providing a user-friendly interface for accessing OpenAI's and ElevenLabs' APIs. Please note that AI Sparks Studio is not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by OpenAI or ElevenLabs. It is crafted to facilitate seamless interaction with these services, assuming users have their own API access. This project aims to empower users by simplifying the process of engaging with these powerful AI models, enhancing creativity and productivity in game development and beyond. All trademarks, service marks, trade names, product names, and logos appearing in AI Sparks Studio are the property of their respective owners.

Please note, AI Sparks Studio does not provide direct access to AI services. You will need to utilize your own API access to state-of-the-art AI models. Even without an AI service, AI Sparks Studio allows you to engage in the creative process directly. Write both sides of a discussion and branch out at any point, utilizing the software as a simple, but practical dialogue tree editor.

Amplify Your Game Development Process

Boost your AI's capability by defining its role through the system message, unleashing its expertise, creativity, and reasoning capabilities. Engage in insightful discussions with competent AI models, enhancing your game design, story creation, character development, game balancing, and more.

Maintain Full Control and Oversight

Manage the AI model’s context memory limitation and control every parameter the API provides. Monitor cost estimation of API requests and service quota to stay within your budget effortlessly.

Experiment Freely with Discussion Branching

Explore the spectrum of ideas and iterate rapidly with discussion branching. Trigger alternative responses from AI with changed settings or models, while retaining all previous texts. Save your time and resources by branching out the discussion from an earlier relevant point.

Secure Your Data

Ensure data security with local storage of all discussion files. The files are updated additively to ensure no text is lost and are stored in a standard JSON format for easy integration into your game development projects.

Create Dialogue Trees Offline

Even without utilizing any AI service, use AI Sparks Studio offline as a tool for manually creating dialogue trees for your games. The standard JSON format makes it straightforward to integrate these dialogues into your game development projects.
